ValidationRule.description: AEs must add a shipping contact prior to moving oppty to Decision
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c, "Express"), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Revenue Opportunity"), Probability >= 0.5, ISBLANK(Shipping_Contact__c)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Shipping Contact is required to move this Opportunity into Decision stage.
